The tool detected the smell in this class because this class participates in a cyclic dependency. The participating classes in the cycle are: FixedEvent; RepeatEvent

Cause of the Smell: The tool detected the smell in this class because the cohesion among the methods of this class is low. LCOM of this class is: 1.0
if no (Reason): This smell is detected for 2 reasons. Firstly, UserMeta is stored in User for JPA mapping between these entities and the tool is detecting that User has multiple responsibilities due to this. Secondly, User is implementating UserDetails interface (provided by Spring Boot) for Spring Security, and the methods that are part of this interface are not interacting with other User methods (low cohesion). We feel that these reasons are valid since there is not an alternative way to do this.
